translations: n.[微]细菌；[基医]病菌（germ 的复数形式）；致病菌
v.发生（germ 的单三形式）；萌芽

phrs.translation: [比喻]处于初级阶段，处于萌芽阶段
[生]种质；胚质；生殖细胞的细胞质；遗传物质

sentences.sentence: Your dishcloth can harbour many germs.
sentences.translation: 洗碗布中可能藏有很多病菌。

sentences.sentence: Dirty hands can be a breeding ground for germs.
Our immune systems are killing billions of germs right now.
sentences.translation: 我们的免疫系统正在杀死数以十亿计的细菌。
